short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discovering the best launch deals by Indie Makers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Indie.Deals helps you spot great tools and products built by independent makers and creators around the web. 

Indie in short refers to "Independent" in this context and through Indie.Deals you would be able to discover some great products in their early or launch phases and not support them as an early adoptor but also get those products directly from them - some of them exclusively available for Indie.Deals members. 

Through this this chrome extension, you will be able to see the recent most five "New" additions since your last visit and directly access from your favorite. chromium based browser.  Never again miss a great tool just because you weren't in loop when it was teased or launched.

Some products might be with affiliated links too to keep the lights on and run the show, at no additional cost to the user or visitor.
